Playbook.title: stare_down
Playbook.best_fit: question having not multipl choices - the question has a free-form response that requres typing, like with a quiz or exam
Playbook.description: Each response must match the expected response as closely as possible, as defined by the response criteria

Playbook.title: clue_swipe_out
Playbook.description: Each choice is swiped out as time winds down. Points decrease as the available time remaining reduces. No points are available when the clock runs out.

Playbook.title: elimination_clues
Playbook.description: Each clue is associated with exactly one choice only. Each clue informs whether the choice is correct or incorrect. Each clue is revealed one a time with delays in between.

Playbook.title: closest_but_not_over
Playbook.description: Answers that match the exact numeric value get maximum points. Points decrease with increasing distane from the correct value. Any answer above correct value gets no points. Any answer below a tenth of the correct value gets no points either

Playbook.title: choice_matcher
Playbook.description: Each matcher is associated with exactly one choice only.
